title: Noam Chomsky on Russia Ukraine Conflict & Linguistics [PODCAST]
description:
Support small podcasts! Follow us on Spotify or Apple Podcasts
Recorded on February 11th, 2022
https://www.ourthoughtstonight.com/

In this episode we speak to none other than Noam Chomsky. This actual gift of an interview spans a variety of topics, from what is going on between Russia-Ukraine right now, COVID-19 in historical context, to the indirect connection between linguistics and politics.
